creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund and the Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation; purchase from the Thomas Murray Collection
description: blue vest with dark blue, medium blue, and gray-blue vertical stripes; dark blue fabric with yellow stripes appliqued to lapel; patches of dark blue fabric with yellow plaid appliqued to shoulders and yolk; embroidered side panels
dimension:
22 3/4 × 31 in. (57.79 × 78.74 cm) (at widest part, with side panels)
18 7/8 × 31 in. (47.94 × 78.74 cm) (at shoulder)
medium: Cloth: cotton and paper; sashiko (decorative reinforcement stitching), indigo dye
title: Vest (sodenashi) made in Shōnai, Yamagata Prefecture
